oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Request to return Union medical property
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Asst. Surgeon Dr. Elihu Pierce, 6th N.H. Inf., and 9th Corps, USA, requested permission to turn in his medical equipment. In his signature, he notes that he was in "charge of sick on 9 A. C. train." On the reverse side, Samuel Adams, Asst. Surgeon and Medical Inspector, 9th Corps, USA, signed the authorization as Acting Medical Director.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
